column1: Use of a broken or weak cryptographic hashing algorithm on sensitive data
column2: Using broken or weak cryptographic hashing algorithms can compromise security.
column4:
[["Sensitive data (password)"|"relative:///main.py:12:21:12:47"]] is used in a hashing algorithm (SHA256) that is insecure for password hashing, since it is not a computationally expensive hash function.
